definition: last ten days of July and first ten days of August, the second of 三伏 sān fú, three hottest periods of the year
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt

sentences.english: For example, many people often died of hot weather.
sentences.chinese: 時令已進入中伏，越來越多的人抱怨天氣太熱。

sentences.english: Season has entered the Zhongfu, more and more people complain about the hot weather .
sentences.chinese: 時令已進入中伏，越來越多的人抱怨天氣太熱。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method to determinate the voriconazole content in human serum samples.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立人體血清樣本中伏立康唑含量檢測方法。

definition: middle ten days of August, the last of 三伏 sān fú, three hottest periods of the year
to seize a camp/to surprise the enemy in bed
to fall into a trap/taken in by a stratagem/cheated/ripped off
the few are no match for the many/heavily outnumbered/facing impossible odds (idiom)
